title: Commanding Heights : Anand Panyarachun | on PBS

quotes: So we in Thailand, in 1991, have graduated from the early phase of industrialization.
my government did make out a blueprint that our aim, within five years, was to become a regional or subregional financial center

organizations.name: my government
quotes: my government did make out a blueprint that our aim, within five years, was to become a regional or subregional financial center
So we in Thailand, in 1991, have graduated from the early phase of industrialization.
We look at Singapore. Singapore had proved to be a rather effective financial center in Asia.
a notch or two below Singapore or Hong Kong.
You look at England with London and its financial center, Germany with Frankfurt, and America with New York and Chicago, so they had to go hand in hand.
